column4: Im having issues with an ubuntu server that maxxing the gigabit ethernet card up to several minutes each day. How can i find out what kind of traffic this was and what process dit it? Any kind of logs i can check?
netstat or nmap may be able to help, other than that not sure though
That requires me to be standby and use the tools when it happend.. i need to go back in time :P
Hm well, all logs are under /var/log though that's not really helpful :D Sorry, not sure
